item.title: Bills io, the origin
item.description: The idea for Bills io first originated in late 2019 as a way to put an end to my tireless switching of various productivity apps. Prior to creating this app, I used to use apps like Reminders, Todoist, Things, Numbers, etc. to try and create a system for remembering which bills to pay and when. In this process, I was able to create a system, but no app fit that payment flow.
